isis.stitle: TSI 96-12-12 - Revision to the Special Torque Values for the Oil Pick-Up Tube Mounting Bolts Found on the DT 408, DT 466 and International® 530 Diesel Engines and the DT 466E and International® 530E Diesel Engines

subjectgroup.subject: Revision to the Special Torque Values for the Oil Pick-Up Tube Mounting Bolts Found on the DT 408, DT 466 and International® 530 Diesel Engines and the DT 466E and International® 530E Diesel Engines

svcproc.title: DESCRIPTION
svcproc.para: A revision to the special torque value for the oil pick-up tube mounting bolts is as follows:

svcproc.title: DT 408, DT 466 AND INTERNATIONAL® 530, SERVICE MANUAL, EGES 105-1
svcproc.para: Oil Pickup Tube Mounting Bolts 18 Nm (13 lb-ft. or 156 lb-in.)
Oil Pickup Tube Mounting Bolts 20 Nm (15 lb-ft. or 180 lb-in.)

svcproc.title: DT 466E AND INTERNATIONAL® 530E SERVICE MANUAL, EGES 160
svcproc.para: Oil Pickup Tube Mounting Bolts 18 Nm (13 lb-ft. or 156 lb-in.)
Oil Pickup Tube Mounting Bolts 20 Nm (15 lb-ft. or 180 lb-in.)
This change in the torque value improves joint sealing and torque retention.

note.para: Keep a copy of this letter with the Service Manual until it is updated.
